pages.title: Spider Slayer
pages.text: $(li)The Spider Slayer is a variation of the $(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbow$(/l).$(br)$(li)When an arrow fired by this crossbow hits a creature, it will inflict the $(l)Debilitating Sting$() effect

pages.name: Spider Slayer
pages.text: paralyzing an spider and killing it when this effect wears off, or poisoning any other type of creature.
